name: LumaFusion Project Package
summary: An LFPACKAGE file is a project package created by LumaFusion, a video editing program designed for iPad. It contains the project's timeline data and video, audio, and image assets. LFPACKAGE files are Zip archives, so if necessary, you can decompress them using any Zip-decompression utility.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

macos.display_name: Rename .lfpackage to .zip and decompress with any Zip-decompression utility

windows.display_name: Rename .lfpackage to .zip and decompress with any Zip-decompression utility
